ygData.subject: Re: effects?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, first off, there s a new survey up for this list at onelist.com! Check it out! There will be followups! I felt something needed to be done to breathe some
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, first off, there's a new survey up for this list at onelist.com! Check
it out! There will be followups! I felt something needed to be done to
breathe some life into this list... We've had some good questions but no
real answers. I know this is late to reply, but here's a little followup to
the e-mail below.
Location Name Effect Description Level
Najena Tentacle whip Life tap steals around 14 hp Level?
High hold P.G.T Berserk str. +18 str, magic skin, -8 agil 15 in a
group, 22 solo
Crushbone Screaming mace Yaulp +10 str and +22 ac for 18 sec's
party of 14's- solo 22
Loc? Obsidian Shard Obsidian shatter?
Loc? Ebony Blade Ensaring slows target to walking speed
Level?


>From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Masters@onelist.com

><EQ_Monk@onelist.com>, <EQ_Masters@onelist.com>
